description: Transliteration of Hindi भाँग / Urdu بھانگ‎ (bhāṅg).

entries.meaning: (India, Kenya, Uganda, else slang) Cannabis and preparations thereof.
examples: Almost from the outset of her arrival in the town, soft-muted music, the strange, heart-rending, mournful music of the East - suggestive of apes, and pearls, and bhang, and the colour blue - was to be heard, surging from the Nook in monotonous improvisation.
